titles.title: Leading Infrastructure for Tomorrow's America Act
Leading Infrastructure for Tomorrow’s America Act

Smart Energy and Water Efficiency Act of 2017
Smart Energy and Water Efficiency Act of 2017

To rebuild and modernize the Nation's infrastructure to expand access to broadband internet, rehabilitate drinking water infrastructure, modernize the electric grid and energy supply infrastructure, redevelop brownfields, strengthen health care infrastructure, create jobs, protect public health and the environment, and for other purposes.
Leading Infrastructure for Tomorrow's America Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Science, Space, and Technology, Transportation and Infrastructure, Ways and Means, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Science, Space, and Technology
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.
